title: Their Shifter Princess Books 1-3
description: I'll do anything to protect my little sister... even give up on my happily-ever-after.Love is all that keeps me coming home to the beautiful house full of ugly secrets. As soon as I’m eighteen, as soon as I can take custody of my little sister myself, I’m going to run.Then my world is turned upside down by four mysterious men. The heat between us is intense. Their protectiveness feels real. Overnight, they become gods in our town... and to everyone's surprise, these incredible men can’t seem to stay away from me. But can I trust them?I've got a plan to save my sister. I can't risk our one chance for my wild wish for happiness. And the closer I come to escape, the more we're stalked by the monsters that lurk in the shadows.Can I save my little sister from those who hunt us... and still surrender to these men who intend to claim me?This complete series includes Their Shifter Princess, Pack War and Coven's Revenge.Their Shifter Princess is a reverse harem shifter series that includes scenes from the perspectives of all eight men as well as Piper. Contains steamy scenes, protective shifters, and one adorable little girl in pigtails worth risking everything to protect.
author: May Dawson
